msbt.message: Hey, ! I'm all done moving! You were right! This island is real neat!I'm real darn excited to live on .I wanna play with everybody! But first, , I gotta get unpacked!

Hey, ! Man, I took your advice and moved here as quick as I could!This is a real nice island. I bet my bug friends are gonna dig it. And I bet I'll meet more bug friends HERE!I'm gonna finish unpacking today. Y'know, get the bugs outta their bug jars, and get my snack jars put away.But starting tomorrow, let's play every day, !
Hey, ! Already here for a visit?Unpacking this stuff is gonna take me all day. Could ya please come back tomorrow?We live on the same island now, so we'll be able to play every day! I'm so excited, !
! Thanks for inviting me to your island the other day!I'm all moved in now.And, it's just like you said! is a real cool island!

Hey! ! I did it! I moved here!It's a real nice island! I'm so glad I met youand you invited me to live hereand then I moved here!From now on, we'll play lots, and hang out lots, and eat snacks lots, and all kindsa stuff!
Hi, ! It's me, , from , !You invited me to move here and, man, I'm glad I did. This place has the best bugs! And tastiest fish!I just finished unpacking, so we can play whenever, !

Hey there, ! I'm all done moving in!Huh? Man, don't tell me you forgot who I am! It's me, !Youinvited me to move here?I get it! You're just goofing around, pretending not to remember me!<10_4 /> RIGHT?!
Oh! Hey, . I decided to accept your invitation and move here, bu— Ahah<10_10 />ACHOO!!!<10_9 />I've got a cold! I'm gonna relax more than usual and try to get better. We can play once I'm better!
Hey, ! I'm living here now! Surprised? I AM!See, said, "Move to my island." So I did!I'm kinda suggestible.Now that we're on the same island, we'll get to play lots, !
Hey! It's me, !<10_4 /> We met on !<10_4 /> Yesterday! <10_4 />Remember?Anyway, said I'd have fun here so I moved, because I'd maybe have fun!I'm one of the crew now! From !

Hi, I'm !<10_4 /> We've never met before. Nope! Never seen ya in my life!I'm kidding! We met back on . Remember?I'm living here on now! invited me!It's gonna be so much fun! So many new folks to play with, snacks to try, and bugs to talk to, !
Hiii, !I live here now! A huh huh huh! Pretty cool, huh?I'm , by the way!Yeah, man, invited me to move here, and I thought it sounded fun!
It's ! Hey! Long time no see! It's me! !Are you surprised? Last time I saw you was on !I live here now! said I'd like it, and I sure DO!It's real cool to see ya again! Let's snack sometime!
Ah—AH—<10_10 />ACHOO!!!<10_9 />Hey, . invited me, so I decided to move here.<10_10 />ACHOO!!!<10_9 />I can't play right now because I got a cold, .
Hey, ! Guess what? I live here now! A huh huh huh, surprised?Someone from this island invited me here, but they moved away before I got here!It's OK though, because you're here, !

Hey! It's me! !<10_4 /> We met on .I live on now, which is real neat!Somebody from this island invited me to move here, but they moved out before I moved in!I'm just glad to see you're here! is gonna be a great place to hang out!

Hey, it's , right? Do you remember me? We met on !I heard about this island from someone who lives here, but they aren't here now, AH-CHOO!Ugh, I'm getting sick!I gotta get better soon so I can make new friends and try new snacks, !<10_10 />AH-CHOO!<10_9 />

Hey, it's ! You're here to visit already!Yeah, I decided to move back to because the bugs are cooler here.I wanna play with you, but I still gotta unpack.Come back tomorrow, OK? I'll be ready to play, !
Hey! It's me! !I used to live on this island. And we'd hang out, and I'd talk about snacks and bugs and stuff. Do you remember?We get to live on the same island again! I'm so happy, !

Hey, ! It was neat meeting you back on !Talking to you made me homesick for so I moved ba— Ah— Ah—AH— AH— <10_10 />ACHOO!<10_9 />Oh man! Excuse me! I got homesick, but normal sick too.Once I'm better, let's play like we used to, !

It's ! Remember that time we met on ?It's me! ! Remember? ? That's me! I didn't know you lived on !I just moved here today because it seemed like a good idea and also because I was bored!I'm happy you're here too. It already makes this island feel more like home, !
Huh? ?! What the heck are you doing here?YOU live here on ?Oh man, no way! Me! Too!I'm so happy we live on the same island now, !

! Do you remember me?<10_4 /> I'm !I didn't know you moved to !You've been here all along? You live on this island?<10_4 /> A huh huh huh! I had no idea!Now that we live on the same island, we'll get to hang out lots!

Hey, ! It's funny seeing you here!What?! You live here?! A huh, I musta missed your house when I was saying hi to everybody! Oops!I live here now, so I'm really excited to hang out with you every day and eat snacks and play, !

Hey You're I know youum, right? Sorry, my brain isn't plugged all the way in right now. I have a cold.I moved here the other day, but I haven't said hi to anyone yet because of this cold!I'll get my brain working again soon so I can get to know everyone. See ya then, !
Hey, ! I'm all done moving! You were right, this island is neat!I'm real excited to live on .I wanna play with everybody! But first, , I gotta get unpacked!

Hey, ! Man, I took your advice and moved here as quick as I could!This is a real nice island. I bet my bug friends are gonna like it. And I bet I'll meet more bug friends HERE!I'm gonna finish unpacking today. Y'know, get the bugs outta their bug jars, and get my snack jars put away.But starting tomorrow, let's play every day, !

Hey, ! Already here for a visit?Unpacking this stuff is gonna take me all day, so can you please come back tomorrow?We live on the same island now, so we'll be able to play every day! I'm so excited, !
! Thanks for inviting me to your island the other day!I'm all moved in now.And it's just like you said! is a real cool island!

Hey! ! I did it! I moved here!It's a real nice island! I'm so glad I met you and that you invited me to live hereand then I did!From now on, we'll play lots, and hang out lots, and eat snacks lots, and all kindsa stuff!
Hi, ! It's me, , from the day trip!You invited me to move here and, man, I'm glad I did. This place has the best bugs! And tastiest fish!I just finished unpacking, so we can play whenever, !

Hey there, ! I'm all done moving in!Huh? Man, don't tell me you forgot who I am! It's me, !Youinvited me to move here?I get it! You're just goofing around, pretending not to remember me!<10_4 /> RIGHT?!
Oh, hey, . I decided to accept your invitation and move here, bu—uh—uh—<10_10 />ACHOO!!!<10_9 />I've got a cold! I'm gonna relax more than usual and try to get better. We can play once I'm better!
I'm all done moving! You were right—this island is neat!I'm real excited to live on .I wanna play with everybody! But first, , I gotta get unpacked!

Hey, ! Man, I took your advice and moved here as quick as I could!This is a real nice island. I bet my bug friends are gonna like it. And I bet I'll meet more bug friend HERE!I'm gonna finish unpacking today. Y'know, get the bugs outta their bug jars and get my snack jars put away.But starting tomorrow, let's play every day, !

Hey, ! Already here for a visit?Unpacking this stuff is gonna take me all day, so can you please come back tomorrow?We live on the same island now, so we'll be able to play every day! I'm so excited, !
! Thanks for chatting with me at the campsite!I'm all moved in now.And it's just like you said! is a real cool island!

Hey! ! I did it! I moved here! Just like I promised back at the campsite!It's a real nice island! I'm so glad I met you and that you invited me to live hereand then I did!From now on, we'll play lots, and hang out lots, and eat snacks lots, and all kindsa stuff!
! It's me, . We met at the campsite!You invited me to move here and, man, I'm glad I did. This place has the best bugs! And tastiest fish!I just finished unpacking, so we can play whenever, !

Hey there, ! I'm all done moving in!Huh? Man, don't tell me you forgot who I am! It's me, !Youinvited me to move here? When we met at the campsite?I get it! You're just goofing around, pretending not to remember me!<10_4 /> RIGHT?!

Oh, hey, . After we met at the campsite, I kinda thought it'd be cool to muh—uh—<10_10 />WACHOO!!!<10_9 />I've got a cold! I'm gonna relax more than usual and try to get better. We can play once I'm better!

Oh, hey, ! Surprised to see my house here? I live here now! Neat, huh?I bumped into while I was snacking at the campsite, and we got talkingOne thing led to a second thing, and after another four or five things, I decided to live here, !
Hi! It's me! ! Remember me? I camped here the other day! Me! ! invited me to move here, so I moved. Here! I moved here!Now I'm a -er, like you! Here! On !
Nice to meet ya, I'm !<10_4 /> A huh huh! I'm joking, !Surprised to see me on , huh? I live here now!I got invited by at the campsite here!I'm a fellow -er now, so prepare to snack!

Hey, ! Remember me? I was here camping before. It's !I live on this island now! Surprised, huh? invited me at the campsite here, and I decided to move here!I'm sure there's a buncha stuff I don't know about this island, so ya gotta tell me all about it!
Hey, ! Long time no see. It's me, !When I was at the campsite earlier, invited me! So Now I live here. I'm glad I got to finally say hi, .

Ah-AH-<10_10 />ACHOO!!!<10_9 />Oh hey, . It's me, ! I live here now. invited me when I was visiting the campsite here, so I moved to this island!I can't play right now because of this cold, but let's hang out once I'm better, .
Hey, ! It's me, ! I live here! Starting today!Looks like the island resident who invited me when I was here camping is gone, and that's a shame.I'm not lonely, though! I got you, after all.

Nice to meet ya, I'm !<10_4 /> I'm kidding! I remember you, !I actually live here now. It's all 'cause I got invited to move here when I was camping.But the person who invited me isn't here anymorewhich is a shame.But I got you, ! And that's all a guy could ask for, !

Oh hey, . Remember me? ! I was here camping!I moved here 'cause someone invited me at the campsite, but I can't find 'em now.I wanna hurry up and chill with you, but I gotta fix this cold first. See ya soon!

Hey, . Welcome to Day One at 's house!Thanks for inviting me to this island back at the campsite! It's thanks to you that my home is here now!I wanna hurry up and explore , but I gotta unpack first, !
Hey, ! I've been waiting for you!I wanna thank you for inviting me to this island when I was at the campsite!Look at me! I'm a neighbor!
Yaaay, ! Welcome to 's! I thought I'd be seeing you.Thanks for inviting me back at the campsite. Moving here was a great idea!I'm so excited to chill with you every day now!<10_4 /> After I unpack
Hey, . Remember me? ! I live here!Remember how you invited me to move here when I was at the campsite?Well, I did it! Here I am! Here! Now! Forever! And ever, !
! It's me, ! I'm so happy to see you again!I wouldn't even be here if you hadn't invited me to move when I was at the campsite.Come chill at my place whenever, !

Hi there, ! It's me! ! We met at the campsite the other day.When you told me I should move to your island, I didn't even think. I just did it!Now that I'm here we can chill and snack and do whatever, whenever! It's gonna be great, !

Oh, ! There ya are!<10_4 /> You still remember me, yeah?I'm ! You invited me to move to this island when I was at the campsiteso I did!I was worried I'd got the wrong island 'cause you weren't anywhere!I'm so relieved I found you! Make sure you chat me up whenever ya see me, !
Uuuuggghhhmm Hi. You're , yeah? I'm .I moved here 'cause you invited me at the campsite.I'll chill with you once I'm over this cold. Sound good, ?
Hey, ! It's me, ! We met at the campsite. Surprised to see me?I moved here 'cause invited me to!Now, I gotta unpack and say hi to everybody on the island!
Hiya, ! It's me, ! We met at the campsite, remember?While I was there, invited me to move here! I figured what the heck, they smelled goodSo I'm a fellow -er starting today, !

Hi there, ! It's ! I was here camping. Now I actually live here!I got talking with when I was visiting the campsite, and they suggested I move here.So that's why we're island buddies now, a huh huh, !
Heeey, ! I was at the campsite the other day. It's !Someone I met there invited me to move here, soI did! A huh huh, know who it was?It was ! It's totally their fault that I'm here now, !
Hey, . It's me, ! Been a while, huh?Remember meeting at the campsite? That's when invited me here!I've been trying real hard, and I think I smell like already!Let's chill all the time, !
Is that you, ? It's me, . invited me to move here when I was here camping, and it sounded neat, so I did itA huh huh huh, I have a cold now, so I can't chill today. Don't wanna give it to ya, .

Hey, ! It's ! I live here startingtoday!I moved because somebody invited me when I was at the campsite, and I'm easily talked into doing things.I wanna chill and snack with ya, but I gotta unpack first. I'll finish it today, !

Hey! I'm . Nice to meet ya!<10_4 /> I'm joking, I'm joking! I've missed ya, !I live on now, 'cause somebody invited me when I was at the campsite. I think that certain somebody isn't here anymore But that's cool, 'cause you're here!

Is that you, ? It's me, .Remember I was at the campsite? I moved here 'cause somebody there invited meA huh huh huh, sorry. I can't chill with ya until I'm over this cold, but let's hang once I'm all better.
